findings.title: Owner can change transaction tax, allowances, etc.
findings.description: The contract owner has the ability to modify transaction-related parameters such as taxes and allowances, which could lead to unintended consequences or malicious behavior.

findings.title: Owner can mint tokens one-time
findings.description: The contract owner has the ability to mint tokens only once.

findings.title: Owner can not burn/lock users' assets
findings.description: The contract owner does not have the capability to burn or lock users' assets.

findings.title: Owner can not pause the contract
findings.description: The owner of the contract does not have the ability to pause it.
